name: Physics Simulations
tagline: Simple web apps for demonstrating neat physics phenomena.
body:
### Columbia Physics Simulations.
This site holds demos of physical phenomena made by graduate and undergraduate students in Columbia's Physics Department. Our goal is to find simple ways to illustrate nonintuitive phenomena through interactive visual aids. Some of these demonstrations will end up on World Science U.

## Simulations
[__Special Relativity:__ Lamp in a Train](sr)

## Contributors
Stefan Countryman: @stefco

Liutauras Rusaitis: @rusaitis

Patrick Rutkowski: @patrick-rutkowski
